text:
We are hiring across a wide number of roles here at Elastic, makers of Elasticsearch, Logstash (what I work on), Beats, and more: http://grnh.se/v38rcs1 . We are a 100% remote company, with a lot of flexibility, and a very happy team.

I'll just say that I love working with smart, motivated OSS developers from across the world in a culture where we implicitly trust people to do the right thing. That lets us avoid a lot of stifling process that I've seen in other jobs.
